trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud is keen to report back to the Admiral.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Merlwyb in the command room.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Merlwyb.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_ALISAIE_100_001<tab>I don't know about you, but it was all I could do to stop myself punching Sicard in the smirking face whenever he opened his mouth.

TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_GRAHATIA_100_002<tab>Though I have some passing knowledge of prior events, I am yet ill qualified to meddle in Lominsan affairs. 'Twas not my place to argue with Sicard, much as I would have liked to.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_GRAHATIA_200_002<tab>Nay, it is for the Admiral to deal with him and the Bloody Executioners both. By bringing them to the negotiating table, we have played our part.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>I thought myself the hunter, but it turns out I was the prey... A timely reminder that the pirate powers of Limsa Lominsa are not to be trifled with.

TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_ALPHINAUD_000_001<tab>But all's well that ends well. G'raha Tia's timely provocation had the desired effect, and Sicard has agreed to a meeting. Let us hurry back to Limsa Lominsa and pass on his invitation to the Admiral.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>Sicard does not want for confidence, that much is plain, but I have faith in the Admiral. She has dealt with far worse.

TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_ALISAIE_000_006<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Astalicia<var 1A 01 /var> is the very last place for such a meeting. The Admiral will be marching right into the coeurl's den. <sigh> I hope we don't end up regretting this...
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_GRAHATIA_000_007<tab>While we have no assurances Sicard will be amenable to reason, there can be no compromise without discussion.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_008<tab>There you are. We have eagerly awaited your return.

TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_ZANTHAEL_000_020<tab><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) /var>)) /var>, your companions have already reported to the command room. Will you be joining them?
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>Proceed to the command room?
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_MERLWYB_000_010<tab>Welcome back, my friends. What news?
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_MERLWYB_100_011<tab>So they have been stealing crystals from the kobolds...
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_MERLWYB_000_011<tab>My thanks for solving the mystery, and securing a meeting besides.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_MERLWYB_100_012<tab>Suffice to say, I accept Sicard's invitation. And I would have you join me as my guests.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_MERLWYB_000_012<tab>The future of Limsa hangs upon the outcome of this meeting, and I would have the Scions present to bear witness.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>When the discussion gave way to a duel, I feared what might unfold. Yet only a fool would underestimate the Admiral─as Sicard soon discovered.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_ALISAIE_000_021<tab>While I don't condone what Sicard has been doing, I know how difficult it can be to change course. It took me long enough to join the Scions, didn't it.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_GRAHATIA_000_022<tab>There are times when one must stand one's ground, even if the cost of failure is beyond reckoning.

TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_GRAHATIA_100_022<tab>The Admiral did just that, and I have nothing but respect for her. As she continues to steer her nation through this period of transition, I pray the Navigator will see fit to fill her sails.

TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_000_023<tab>Like Mistbeard before him, Hyllfyr chose to trust the future of our nation to the Admiral. That was the moment, I believe, that the good ship Limsa Lominsa finally embarked upon her new course.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_MERLWYB_000_030<tab>...Though I had anticipated a duel, I did not foresee that Hyllfyr would intervene.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_MERLWYB_000_031<tab>But full glad am I that he did. 'Twould have been a shame to kill the boy.
TEXT_LUCKMJ108_04014_MERLWYB_000_032<tab>Instead, the whelp has learned a valuable lesson, and we have made peace amongst ourselves. All that remains is to do likewise with our neighbors.
